subject: Volvo Ocean Race
Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: Franck Cammas took a big step toward becoming only the second Frenchman to win the Volvo Ocean Race with a victory in the Lisbon in-port race, extending Groupama’s lead over Telefonica by 8 points.
snippet: Franck Cammas took a big step toward becoming only the second Frenchman to win the Volvo Ocean Race with a victory in the Lisbon in-port race, extending Groupama’s lead over Telefonica by 8 points.
